title: Summary of the Power BI update May 2023
excerpt: Join this channel membership to get access to all the recorded bites as they become available: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw/join  Did you also miss that the Power BI update for May was out?
